snippet: The restaurant hopes to emerge from bankruptcy in May, but one expert says its business model no longer works because people want food that has been made to order.
abstract: Pizza restaurant china Sbarro files for bankruptcy protection for second time in five years.
lead_paragraph: The restaurant hopes to emerge from bankruptcy in May, but one expert says its business model no longer works because people want food that has been made to order.

headline.main: Struggling Pizza Chain Sbarro Seeks Bankruptcy Protection Again
headline.print_headline: Sbarro, Struggling Pizza Chain, Files Again for Bankruptcy
